description.message: Ensures that required icons are specified in the web app manifest

iconCouldNotBeFetched.description: Report message when an icon can't be fetched
iconCouldNotBeFetched.message: Icon could not be fetched (request failed).

iconCouldNotBeFetchedStatusCode.description: Report message when an icon request return an status code !== 200
iconCouldNotBeFetchedStatusCode.message: Icon could not be fetched (status code: $1).

iconShouldBeValidImageType.description: Report message when the image type is not valid
iconShouldBeValidImageType.message: Icon should be a valid image type $1

iconTypeNotSpecified.description: Report message when an icon type is not specified

mimeTypeNotMatch.description: Report message when the MIME type doesn't match the specified type
mimeTypeNotMatch.message: MIME type ($1) do not match with specified type ($2)

realImageSizeNotMatch.description: Report message when the real size image don't match the specified in sizes
realImageSizeNotMatch.message: Real image size ($1x$2) do not match with specified size(s) ($3)

realImageType.description: Report message whe the type specified and the real type doesn't match
realImageType.message: Real image type ($1) do not match with specified type ($2)

requiredSizes.description: Report message when the required sizes are not found

sizesNotSpecified.description: Report message when the sizes are not specified

validIconsNotFound.message: Valid icons property was not found in the web app manifest
